data.title: Country Capital and Currency List 2024
data.meta_description: Complete list of countries capitals and currencies 2024 are very important for any competitive exams as it is asked in almost every competitive exam in India. Most questions related to Nations capitals and currencies guide 2024 are based on MCQs. So remembering the name of all Nations capitals and currencies guide 2024 is very important.
data.text:
Complete list of countries capitals and currencies 2024 are very important for any competitive exams as it is asked in almost every competitive exam in India. Most questions related to Nations capitals and currencies guide 2024 are based on MCQs. So remembering the name of all Nations capitals and currencies guide 2024 is very important.

Check the 2024 world countries capitals and currencies names from the below table.

Country Capital and Currency List 2024

Here are the List of all country currencies 2024:

Updated Country Capital Currency List – Famous Currency in the World

Below are details of some popular currencies in the world.

US Dollar (USD)

US dollar is the official currency of the United States. It Issued by the Federal Reserve (Fed). It is the number-one most traded currency globally, accounting for a daily average volume of US$2.9 trillion.

USD to INR Currency Converter

Euro (EUR)

The euro is the official currency of the European Union (EU) and the second most traded globally, accounting for a daily average volume of nearly US$1.1 trillion. It is issued by the European Central Bank (ECB).

Japanese yen (JPY)

The Japanese yen is the official currency of Japan and the third most traded globally, accounting for a daily average volume of US$554 billion. It is also the third-biggest reserve currency, estimated to make up around 4.9% of global currency reserves. 3 It is issued by the Bank of Japan.

The Pound Sterling (GBP)

The pound sterling is the official currency of the United Kingdom and its territories and the fourth most traded globally, with a daily average volume of nearly US$422 billion. It is also the fourth-biggest reserve currency, estimated to account for 4.5% of global reserves by value.

Chinese renminbi (CNH)

The Chinese renminbi—sometimes referred to colloquially as the ‘yuan’—is the official currency of the People’s Republic of China and the eighth most traded globally, accounting for a daily average volume of US$142 billion. It is issued by the People’s Bank of China.

Indian Rupee (INR)

The Indian rupee (INR) is the official currency of the Republic of India and is issued by the Reserve Bank of India. The Indian rupee derives its name from the rupiya, a silver coin first issued by Sultan Sher Shah Suri in the 16th century. The Indian rupee accounted for only 1.6 percent of the global forex turnover.

Most Traded Currencies 2024

Country Capital and Currency List 2024 – FAQs

What are the latest changes in country capitals and currencies for 2024?

Recent changes include capitals like Naypyidaw in Myanmar and new currencies like the digital yuan in China.

Which countries have updated their capitals or currencies recently?

Notable updates include Kazakhstan, which shifted its capital to Nursultan, and Venezuela, which introduced the Petro cryptocurrency due to economic challenges.

How can I find the most updated list of countries, capitals, and currencies for 2024?

Reliable sources include official government websites, the United Nations, and the International Monetary Fund for the latest and most accurate information.

Are there any new countries added to the 2024 list of capitals and currencies?

No new countries were officially recognized in 2024; however, ongoing geopolitical changes may impact this.

What is the easiest way to memorize country capitals and currencies?

Utilize mnemonic devices, flashcards, and interactive quizzes online for effective and enjoyable memorization.

How do political changes affect a country’s capital or currency?

Political events, like regime changes or independence, can prompt updates in capitals and currencies to reflect evolving national identities.

Can you provide a quick reference guide for the most traded currencies in 2024?

Top traded currencies include the US Dollar, Euro, and Japanese Yen, with fluctuations influenced by global economic trends.

What are some unusual facts about country capitals or currencies?

Bolivia’s currency includes images of indigenous heroes, and Lesotho is entirely landlocked, making it unique among countries with its currency.

How do countries decide to change their currency?

Economic instability, hyperinflation, or a need for rebranding can drive countries to introduce a new currency, often involving economic and political considerations.

Where can educators find resources for teaching about country capitals and currencies?

Websites like National Geographic, CIA World Factbook, and educational tools like Seterra and Kahoot! offer comprehensive resources for teaching geography and economics.

Which country’s currency is no. 1?

The highest-valued currency in the world is the Kuwaiti dinar (KWD). Since it was first introduced in 1960, the Kuwaiti dinar has consistently ranked as the world’s most valuable currency.

What is the capital and currency of India?

The capital of India is New Delhi, and the currency is the Indian rupee.

How many countries are there in the world?

There are 197 countries in the world.
